author: acumiskey
msg: AFPFontReader a lot more robust now with less copy/pasted code but still far from ideal, the whole AFP FOCA parsing/handling still in need of a rewrite at some point.
CharacterSetOrientation width() renamed to getWidth() and now protects itself against a possible ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
